title: Engineers Week: 'Computer engineers pave the way for the future'
description: Joshua Perkins, a junior at Missouri S&T, has long been interested in having a career as a computer engineer. The reason why?

title: Enrollments in Computer Engineering surge, mechanical sees a dip: AISHE Report
description: Student enrollments in Computer Engineering has gone up by nearly 38 per cent in the past three years as the number increased from 9.3 lakh in 2019-20 to 12 lakh in 2021-22, a recent government survey revealed.

title: What’s the difference between data science and computer science?
description: Computer science interacts with data, and data science interacts with computers. Some schools have schools have distinct computer science and data science programs. Others combine them into one.

title: UC engineering student merges human language, computer science
description: Zedong Peng came to the University of Cincinnati to continue his research in software engineering, focusing on natural language processing and metamorphic testing.

title: Top Government IT Jobs For Computer Science in 2023
description: The government departments that require a computer science graduate are Railways, Defence, Police departments, PSUs, Banking sectors, BSNL etc. Read the article to know the top ten government sectors that hire IT/CSE graduates all over the country.

title: Method identified to double computer processing speeds
description: Tseng explained that today’s computer devices increasingly have graphics processing units (GPUs), hardware accelerators for artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), or digital signal processing units as essential components.

title: What is USB-C? A computer engineer explains the one device connector to rule them all
description: Apple announced on Sept. 12, 2023, that it plans to adopt the USB-C connector for all four new iPhone 15 models, helping USB-C become the connector of choice of the electronics industry, nine years after its debut.
